metadata.title: CVE-2024-41073 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvme: avoid double free special payloadIf a discard request needs to be retried, and that retry may fail beforea new special payload is added, a double free will result. Clear theRQF_SPECIAL_LOAD when the request is cleaned.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
